verbose_text: Specifically ghrelin in the plasma increases preprandially in fasting conditions and before meal initiation and will rapidly decrease nadir postprandially [XREF_BIBR] and therefore is reported to play a role in appetite regulation, meal frequency, and hunger [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: ghrelin in the plasma increases preprandially in fasting conditions and before meal initiation and will rapidly decrease nadir
